DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesize that pravastatin combined with valsartan may have additive effects in hypertensive, hypercholesterolemic patients.
DOC.brief_title: Additive Effects of Pravastatin and Valsartan
DOC.criteria: Hypertension and lowdensity lipoprotein cholesterol levels >100 Overt liver disease Chronic renal failure Hypothyroidism Myopathy Uncontrolled diabetes Severe hypertension
